Hotel.name: The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, you'll be centrally located in New York, minutes from Grand Central Terminal and Chrysler Building. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Broadway.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in New York? This hotel has 30000 square feet (2787 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services.
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, you'll be centrally located in New York, minutes from Grand Central Terminal and Chrysler Building. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Broadway.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Grand Central Terminal - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Chrysler Building - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
NBC Studios - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
St. Patrick's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
New York Public Library - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Rockefeller Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
International Center of Photography - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Top of the Rock Observation Deck - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bryant Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Television and Radio - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Radio City Music Hall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
The Morgan Library and Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
American Folk Art Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Modern Art - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Broadway - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.5 km / 4 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.3 km / 11.4 mi

The preferred airport for The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Roosevelt Hotel New York are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.3 km / 11.4 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 20.5 km / 12.7 mi

The preferred airport for Roosevelt Hotel New York is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

Room 1
There is a Facility Fee of $35 USD + 14.75% tax that must be paid directly at the hotel per night. This fee includes:<br><br> Discount on food purchases in all outlets (except Room Service and alcoholic beverages)<br>Complimentary Wi-Fi<br>Access to a digital library (newspapers and magazines)<br>Access to the fitness center<br>Free local calls<br><br>

TWO DOUBLE BEDS. FOR RES BOOKED ON MAY 1ST,2018. ONWARD FACILITY FEE OF $35+TAX P/R P/D. TO BE PAID DIRECTLY. NO NAME CHANGE ALLOWED!

Room 1

Notice
Effective July 15, 2018 all new bookings for stay dates that include the months of January February 2018 will be exempt from the daily facilities fee of $40.17


Please note that check in time is after 3:00 p.m. Checkout time is before 12:00 noon. Guests may arrange for baggage storage with the Bell Captain for a minimal fee.


Please note that as of May 1st 2018 all bookings will have a Facility fee applied. The fee is USD 35.00 plus 14.75 % tax, for a total of USD 40.16 nightly. Facility fee includes: 10 % Discount on food purchases in all outlets except Room Service. (alcohol not included), Access to digital library, Unlimited access to Fitness Center, Free local calls. Facility fee is due upon check in.


Effective July 15, 2018 all new bookings for stay dates that include the months of January February 2019 will be exempt from the daily facilities fee of $40.17


Please note that the use of Wi-fi connection is charged extra, payable locally.

A minimum valet parking fee of $68 per room, per day, per vehicle will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. Self parking is also available but subject to a fee as well. The fees are subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due.

This property has a mandatory fee of $35 (plus tax) USD per room per night resort charge that is not included in your vacation package price. It is collected by the property at time of check-in. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. For a detailed description of whats included in the mandatory fee, see hotel policies.

Room 1
From 2013-03-05 To 2030-12-31
Child policy
Persons under the age of twenty-one (21) are not permitted to stay.They have to stay with another person over the the age of twenty-one (21).

From 2016-09-14 To 2030-12-31
Stay Conditions
There is a restriction on stays longer than 28 day in New York City. Clients will not be able to make bookings for any longer than this.

From 2017-12-01 To 2030-12-31
Resort Fee
There is a resort fee of $40.16 per room per day payable directly to the hotel by the guests and Includes: local & long distance calls, fitness center with indoor pool, wifi, 2 welcome drinks, 15% discount on lunch, 20% discount on dinner at Stout & Feile. $5 off Candytopis admission ticket for 1, 10% off Pennsy's participating vendors for 1 person.

Important Information: Please note a minimum age requirement applies to most US hotels. In many hotels the primary guest must be at least 21 years of age on the day of check-in. For some hotels the minimum age is 18. Upon check-in photo ID may be required. You may contact our call centre prior to booking to confirm whether restrictions apply.

Important Information: Please note that the rooftop bar is closed due to renovation works until 31 December 2019.

For some hotels the minimum age is 18. Upon check-in photo ID may be required. You may contact our call centre prior to booking to confirm whether restrictions apply.

Important Information: Please note that the rooftop bar is closed due to renovation works until 31 December 2019.

Resort Fee: Service Tax included. Resort fee excluded: $ 35.00 plus tax per night payable by the guest directly to the hotel. (Charges subject to change).
